version_description:
1. Consumers can now pay their bills using Paytm wallet.
2. Bug fixes.

1. Find MSEDCL Offices and Collection centres near you.
2. Estimate your monthly consumption and bill amount.
3. Get Feeder Information from where power supply is provided to your connection.
4. Report any suspected electricity theft activity in your area.
5. Submit application for addition / reduction in load
6. Update Aadhar card number.
7. Complaint / Service Request can be closed if issue is resolved.

1. New Connection estimate charges can be paid through app.
2. Bug Fixes

1. Check Off Grid AG Solar Status and assign vendors
2. Bug fixes

1. Added facility to pay bill amount partially.
2. Resolved Paynimo Payment Gateway compatibility issues for newer versions of iOS.
3. Other minor bug fixes.

1. Guest users can now submit meter reading with authentication through OTP on registered mobile number. (Facility given in side menu of home screen)
2. Bug fixes

1. Provision for various notifications such as bill alert, payment acknowledgement, Self meter reading, etc.
2. View and delete downloaded receipts.
3. Bug fixes.

Added facility to report transformer failures
Bug Fixes

1. Added closure remarks in complaint details.

2. Bug fixes
